modShortDescription: Just the food and water bars from KhaineGB's backpack mods so users can use larger backpacks if they so wish.
modDescription:
Just the food and water bars from KhaineGB’s [backpack mods](https://7daystodiemods.com/bigger-backpack-mod-60-96-slot-with-without-food-water-bar-on-hud/) so users can use larger backpacks if they so wish.

**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/KhaineGB/KhaineA20ModletsXML/tree/main/KHA20-FoodWater)** for A20  
**[Download](https://gitlab.com/KhaineGB/khaines-modlets-a19/-/archive/master/khaines-modlets-a19-master.zip?path=KHA19-FoodWater)** for A19

If you appreciate KhaineGB’s work and you want to show support, use this [donate link](https://www.paypal.com/paypalme/khainegb).

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/25751-khaines-a20-modlets-bigger-backpacks-lockable-slots-behemoths-random-wandering-hordes-etc/).

**Credits:** [KhaineGB](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/khainegb/)
